name: Brecht-Tage
description: The Brecht-Tage take place traditionally around Bertolt Brecht's birthday on February 10. The 2026 theme is 'Die Erde, die große Nährerin. Brechts grüne Revolution' (The Earth, the Great Nurturer. Brecht's Green Revolution), focusing on a little-examined part of Brecht's work: the impacts of industrial society on nature. The event includes talks, readings, workshops and accompanying events across Berlin, like 'Brecht im Planetarium' at Zeiss-Großplanetarium.
